Package ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.node

Class AbstractNode

java.lang.Object
ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.node.AbstractNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractRoyaleNode, AbstractSquadNode, AbstractStandardNode, AlphaNode
public abstract class AbstractNode
extends java.lang.Object
This abstract node class is the based of all node class, provide basic method use in any node.
Version:
Spring 2021
Author:
carl.lajeunesse
